text: The Loverman Jerry Wade keeps you company while you're on the j-o-b, Monday - Friday from 10 a.m. - 3 p.m. Born and raised in Indianapolis and former longtime Quiet Storm host, Jerry just wants to keep you motivated and help you have a great day. At 11 a.m. tune in for Jerry's Classifieds as he helps you make that big career move or find a job. Then at Noon, he and DJ King turn it up during the 12 O'clock Throwback Mix. An avid lover of all things Indianapolis, his goal is simply to see you smile. Call Jerry at 317-239-1067 or on our Twitter, Facebook and Instagram pages at @1067WTLC. Hashtag #WorkWithJerry. Jerry Wade, an Indianapolis native, has been honored by a few of Indianapolis’ beloved organizations. Including, The Mozel Sanders We Feed the Hungry program Radio Award and the Indiana Black Expo Radio Broadcast Media Award.

title: Kerry Washington Loves Being Part of the Pixar Family Even If Her Kids “Don’t Get It” Yet

twitter.title: Kerry Washington Loves Being Part of the Pixar Family Even If Her Kids
twitter.description: Kerry showed up to the Cars 3 premiere with a heart full of love. She voices new character Natalie Certain in the upcoming third installment of the film series. Source E News
